resources.name: Profile Update
resources.description:
### Update your profile details

Update your profile informations using this endpoint

### Body Parameters

| Key          | Value |
|:--------  |:-------|
| bio  | something about yourself |
| youtube | youtube account link if they have an account |
| instagram | instagram account link if they have an account |
| facebook | facebook account link if they have an account |
| twitter | twitter account link if they have an account |

### Response

#### 200 Ok

```JSON
{
  "response": {
    "statusCode": 200,
    "message": "Success",
    "error": false,
    "version": "*.*.*"
  },
  "data": {
    "message": "Success",
    "data": {
      "_id": "619547a7c6e7a612e8379765",
      "isActive": true,
      "bio": "Hey, This is Bio",
      "followers": [
        "618f9830b6cff52dc81ddf8b"
      ],
      "following": [],
      "userName": "unique username",
      "email": "",
      "phone": "",
      "createdAt": "2021-11-17T18:19:19.311Z",
      "updatedAt": "2021-11-18T08:16:14.197Z",
      "wallet": "",
      "social": {
        "youtube": "https://www.youtube.com/",
        "instagram": "https://www.instagram.com/",
        "facebook": "https://www.facebook.com/",
        "twitter": "https://twitter.com/"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

#### 401 Unauthorized

```JSON
{
  "response": {
    "statusCode": 401,
    "message": "Unauthorized",
    "error": true,
    "version": "*.*.*"
  },
  "data": []
}
```

#### 400 Bad Request

```JSON
{
  "response": {
    "statusCode": 400,
    "message": "validation error message",
    "error": true,
    "version": "*.*.*"
  },
  "data": []
}
```

resources.name: Itsmyne-API-Docs
resources.description:
Welcome to Itsmyne-api documentation page!. 

NFTs are tokens that we can use to represent ownership of unique items. They let us tokenise things like art, collectibles, even real estate. They can only have one official owner at a time and they're secured by the Ethereum blockchain â€“ no one can modify the record of ownership or copy/paste a new NFT into existence.

Itsmyne-api provides access to use our REST API services for building an NFT market place where users can create and sell NFTs.

All API calls must be authenticated.

Itsmyne uses API keys to authenticate all API calls. You can request an API key by contacting our support team.

### Common Error Response

#### 404 Not Found

```JSON
{
  "message": "Route not found",
  "error": "Not Found",
  "statusCode": 404
}
```

#### 422 Unprocessable Entity

```JSON
{
  "response": {
    "statusCode": 422,
    "message": "Validation Error Message",
    "error": true,
    "version": "1.4.7"
  },
  "data": []
}
```

resources.name: User Login
resources.description:
### Login

User can login to their account using this endpoint. It will return a JWT token, which is passed in header as Authorization for protected routes.

### Body Parameters

| Key          | Value |
|:--------  |:-------|
| userName | username of the user |
| password | password of the user |

### Response

#### 200 Ok

```JSON
{
  "response": {
    "statusCode": 200,
    "message": "Success",
    "error": false,
    "version": "1.4.7"
  },
  "data": {
    "message": "login successfull",
    "data": "eyJh**************"
  }
}
```

#### 401 Unauthorized

```JSON
{
  "response": {
    "statusCode": 401,
    "message": "Unauthorized",
    "error": true,
    "version": "*.*.*"

}
```

```JSON
{
```

```JSON
  },
  "data": []
}
```

resources.name: Check userName
On Sale
resources.description:
### Put the NFT status to sale

This is the endpoint which will helps you to put the NFT for sale, so that another user could buy it.

> NB: NFTs which are currently in auction cannot be put to sale.

### Body Parameters

| Key          | Value |
|:--------  |:-------|
| asset | id of that particular asset |
| price | price for selling |

### Response

#### 200 Ok

```JSON
{
  "response": {
    "statusCode": 200,
    "message": "Success",
    "error": false,
    "version": "*.*.*"
  },
    "data": {
    "message": "Sale status updated",
    "data": {
      "asset": {
        "path": "https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmVXKUwMZUDfbr4ffoB6BBmpkURB8GWfT9giV5B3WMUMGD",
        "mimeType": "image/jpeg"
      },
      "offer": {
        "price": "0",
        "endDate": ""
      },
      "name": "mountain",
      "price": "5.2",
      "onSale": true,
      "onAuction": false,
      "status": "created",
      "attributes": [
        {
          "trait_type": "size",
          "value": "100x100"
        }
      ],
      "tags": [
        "mountains",
        "hiking"
      ],
      "_id": "61934e49c981a91d589a4fcd",
      "assetType": "721",
      "owner": "618f9830b6cff52dc81ddf8b",
      "creator": "618f9830b6cff52dc81ddf8b",
      "description": "Enjoy trips",
      "assetId": "15",
      "category": "art",
      "domain": "******",

      "updatedAt": "2021-11-16T06:29:40.777Z",
      "__v": 0
    }
  }
}
```

#### 401 Unauthorized


resources.name: Create
resources.description:
### Create OrderId for an NFT

Order is an important step in the payment process. Orders and payments go hand-in-hand. For every payment, an order needs to be created. It is compulsory to create orders to capture payments automatically. 
This endpoint will create an orderId for a particular NFT and sends the orderId as a response inorder to proceed with payements.

### Body Parameters

| Key          | Value |
|:--------  |:-------|
| amount | amount of the NFT * 100 |
| currency | currency used |
| assetId | mongoId of that particular NFT asset |
| numberOfCopy | number of copy of 1155, 1 for 721 |

### Response

#### 200 Ok

```JSON
{
  "response": {
    "statusCode": 200,
    "message": "Success",
    "error": false,
    "version": "*.*.*"
  },
   "data": {
    "message": "Success",
    "data": "order_IN2qG2FH2THtaj"
  }
}
```

#### 401 Unauthorized

```JSON
{
  "response": {
    "statusCode": 401,
    "message": "Unauthorized",
    "error": true,
    "version": "*.*.*"
  },
  "data": []
}
```

#### 400 Bad Request

```JSON
{
  "response": {
    "statusCode": 400,
    "message": "validation error message",
    "error": true,
    "version": "*.*.*"
  },
  "data": []
}
```

resources.name: First Sale
resources.description:
### Transfer Ownership for first sale

When the payment is success, pass the orderId along with payment details to change the ownership of an NFT.


### Body Parameters

| Key          | Value |

| paymentMethod | type of payment method |

resources.name: List all NFT
resources.description:
### List all the NFTs

This endpoint will list all the NFTs in the marketplace

### Body Parameters

| Key          | Value |
|:--------  |:-------|
| status | status of the NFT asset |
| category | category of the NFT asset |
| page | page number |
| searchterm | search term |
| sort | asc or des |

### Response

#### 200 Ok

```JSON
{
  "response": {
    "statusCode": 200,
    "message": "Success",
    "error": false,
    "version": "*.*.*"
  },
   "data": {
    "message": "NFT list",
    "list": [
      {
        "_id": "6195f457437009370ce7c47b",
        "name": "mountain",
        "price": "5",
        "onSale": false,
        "status": "created",
        "attributes": [
          {
            "trait_type": "size",
            "value": "100x100"
          }
        ],
        "tags": [
          "mountains",
          "hiking"
        ],
        "assetType": "721",
        "owner": {ownerDetails...},
        "assetId": "19",
        "category": "art"
      },
      {NFTDetails...},
      {NFTDetails...}
     ]
   }
}
```

#### 401 Unauthorized

```JSON
{
  "response": {
    "statusCode": 401,
    "message": "Unauthorized",
    "error": true,
    "version": "*.*.*"
  },
  "data": []
}
```

resources.name: Like Count
Add to Auction
resources.description:
### Add an NFT to Auction


Add your NFT to auction so that other users could do biding for it.

**If the NFT is already on sale, it cannot be put into auction**

### Body Parameters

| Key          | Value |
|:--------  |:-------|
| assetId | id of that particular asset |
| basePrice | minimum price of the auction |
| timeStart | starting time of auction |
| timeEnd | ending time of auction |
| assetType | type of asset. 721 or 1155 |
| numberOfCopy | number of copy for 1155 assetType, 1 for 721 assetType |

### Response

#### 200 Ok

```JSON
{
  "response": {
    "statusCode": 200,
    "message": "Success",
    "error": false,
    "version": "*.*.*"
  },
   "data": {
    "message": "success",
    "data": {
      "isActive": true,
      "_id": "6194c95b7ec367375c7acde3",
      "assetId": "6194bc183889e803f8811e50",
      "owner": "618f9830b6cff52dc81ddf8b",
      "basePrice": 0.3,
      "timeStart": "2021-11-17T00:00:00.000Z",
      "timeEnd": "2022-11-18T00:00:00.000Z",
      "currentBidPrice": 0.3,
      "domain": "******",
      "createdAt": "2021-11-17T09:20:27.019Z",
      "updatedAt": "2021-11-17T09:20:27.019Z",
      "__v": 0
    }
  }
}
```

```JSON
{
```

resources.name: Mint NFT
resources.description:
### Mint an NFT

This is the next step of NFT creation. This endpoint uploads the details of an NFT in JSON format and mint the NFT and add it to the database.

**Minting an NFT can take upto 20 seconds**

### Body Parameters

| Key          | Value |
|:--------  |:-------|
| name  | name of the NFT |
| category  | category of the NFT |
| tags  | Tags of the NFT |
| price  | Price of the NFT |
| asset  | NFT details that we get from upload endpoint |
| attributes  | attributes of the NFT |
| description  | description about the NFT |
| assetType  | ERC token type, value is 721 or 1155 |
| royalty  | royalty value of the NFT |
| royaltyWallet  | Royalty wallet that you need the royalty |
| numberOfCopy | number of copy for 1155 assetType only, 1 for 721 assetType |
| onSale | add in sales. true or false |

### Response

#### 200 Ok

```JSON
{
  "response": {
    "statusCode": 200,
    "message": "Success",
    "error": false,
    "version": "*.*.*"
  },
"data": {
    "message": "Successfully minted",
    "data": {
      "asset": {
        "path": "https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmVXKUwMZUDfbr4ffoB6BBmpkURB8GWfT9giV5B3WMUMGD",
        "mimeType": "image/jpeg"
      },
      "offer": {
        "price": "0",
        "endDate": ""
      },
      "name": "mountain",
      "oldPrice": "5",
      "price": "5",
      "onSale": false,
      "onAuction": false,
      "status": "created",
      "attributes": [
        {
          "trait_type": "size",
          "value": "100x100"
        }
      ],
      "tags": [
        "mountains",
        "hiking"
      ],
      "royalty": "10",
      "royaltyWallet": "0xEfe73AE58094b481E1B3d5b1000EE44C74541B5e",
      "_id": "6195f457437009370ce7c47b",
      "assetType": "721",
      "owner": "618f9830b6cff52dc81ddf8b",
      "creator": "618f9830b6cff52dc81ddf8b",
      "description": "Enjoy trips",
      "assetId": "",
      "category": "art",
      "domain": "******",
      "transactionHash": "https://testnet.bscscan.com/tx/0x....",
      "createdAt": "2021-11-18T06:36:07.767Z",
      "updatedAt": "2021-11-18T06:36:07.767Z",
      "__v": 0
    }
  }
}
```

resources.name: Update Refund
resources.description:
### Update refund status

This endpoint will update the refund status if refund is done

### Body Parameters

| Key          | Value |
|:--------  |:-------|
| auctionId | id of the auction which is completed |

### Response

#### 200 Ok

```JSON
{
  "response": {
    "statusCode": 200,
    "message": "Success",
    "error": false,
```

resources.name: List Orders
resources.description:
